_header: O ruefully pierced right hand of Christ Jesu
_description: On the five wounds — eleven couplets

Gorhambury.Transcription:
O Rufully perchyd Ryȝth hand of Cryste IesuFrom all worldly
                    mischance All wey thow me rescuPaternoster AveHys lyfthe hand wowndyd
                    cruelly alsoBe my Defense in Sicknes Peyne and WooPaternoster
                    AveO Ryȝthe ffote of Cryst stordely Bored thoroweLet neuer the
                    ffynd my Sinfull Sowle to worowePaternoster AveHys lyfthe ffote
                    crampysshyd with a Bowsters nayleLett neuer the ffynd a geynst my Sowle
                    preualePaternoster Ave
Gorhambury.Note:
Transcription from Gibbs (1883)
XGibbs,  Henry Hucks. 
             “A Fifteenth Century French MS.” 
             Notes and Queries
         6th ser. 8 (1883): 442-3.
